description:
Summary:

DatePicker's highlighted date is set to current date even after user selects a different date.

Steps to reproduce:
Goto->Accounts->Loan fragment
Choose floating action button to apply for loan
Set expected disbursement date to future value and open datepicker dialog again.

Expected behaviour:

DatePickers highlighted date should be the date selected by user previously

Observed behaviour:

DatePickers highlighted date is current date always

Device and Android version:

Motorola Moto G4 (Android 7.0,API 24)
name: [Mifos Mobile] DatePicker's highlighted date is set to current date even after user selects a different date
